section.title: Introduction
section.p: Simal is an open source tool for building project registries. Simal uses the Description of a Project (DOAP) schema to collect, store and present data about projects. Simal is available under the Apache software License V2.

The mission of the Simal project is to create a software framework for the collection and management of essential details about open development projects. Using this data it will be possible to create a picture of development projects and communities, that allows for all increased awareness of existing projects and experts to be found within.
section.warning: Simal is very young at this time, it works, but is far from feature complete. As such, we welcome input into the requirements and design of the initial system via our mailing list.

section.title: Contributing
section.p: Simal is an open source project that adopts an open development methodology. We welcome contributions from anyone, such contributions may include (but are not limited to):

ul.li: User feedback such as bug reports and feature requests
User support such as documentation and mailing list participation
Patches addressing bugs or adding new features
